title: Apple App Store : global category revenue share per business model 2014
summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 17 different Categorys for 3 groups Free apps with in-app purchases, Paid apps without in-app purchases, and Paid apps with in-app purchases that are presented on the X-axis.
In Category Newsstand, Free apps with in-app purchases had the highest SOME LABEL 996.0 among the 3 groups and in Newsstand, Paid apps without in-app purchases had the lowest SOME LABEL 2.0.
In Category Medical, Paid apps without in-app purchases had the maximum SOME LABEL and it saw the lowest in Category Newsstand out of all 17 Categorys.
Category Medical and Newsstand had the biggest gap of 679.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for Paid apps without in-app purchases.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 17 different Categorys for 3 groups Free apps with in-app purchases, Paid apps without in-app purchases, and Paid apps with in-app purchases that are presented on the X-axis.

Category Newsstand had the maximum SOME LABEL among all 3 groups, and it was for Free apps with in-app purchases. The minimum SOME LABEL was observed in Category Newsstand for Paid apps without in-app purchases.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 17 different Categorys for 3 groups Free apps with in-app purchases, Paid apps without in-app purchases, and Paid apps with in-app purchases that are presented on the X-axis.
In Category Newsstand, Free apps with in-app purchases had the highest SOME LABEL 996.0 among the 3 groups and in Newsstand, Paid apps without in-app purchases had the lowest SOME LABEL 2.0.
In Category Medical, Paid apps without in-app purchases had the maximum SOME LABEL and it saw the lowest in Category Newsstand out of all 17 Categorys.
Category Medical and Newsstand had the biggest gap of 679.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for Paid apps without in-app purchases.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 17 different Categorys for 3 groups Free apps with in-app purchases, Paid apps without in-app purchases, and Paid apps with in-app purchases that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 3 groups, Free apps with in-app purchases had the highest SOME LABEL in Category Newsstand and Paid apps without in-app purchases had the lowest SOME LABEL in Category Newsstand.
Among all the Categorys, Paid apps without in-app purchases had the highest SOME LABEL in Category Medical and lowest SOME LABEL in Category Newsstand.
Category Medical and Newsstand had the biggest gap of 679.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for Paid apps without in-app purchases.
Out of all 3 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum SOME LABEL was found in case of Free apps with in-app purchases.

In Category Newsstand, Free apps with in-app purchases had the highest SOME LABEL 996.0 among the 3 groups and in Newsstand, Paid apps without in-app purchases had the lowest SOME LABEL 2.0. The second highest SOME LABEL 681.0 was observed for Free apps with in-app purchases in Category Newsstand.

On average, the Category Productivity had the highest SOME LABEL for all 3 groups Free apps with in-app purchases, Paid apps without in-app purchases, and Paid apps with in-app purchases. Whereas Music had the lowest average SOME LABEL.
